game_description: Join up with your friends and become a chimp! Try out countdown or just chill in casual, maybe hop in the experimental mode where there's new stuff (that might not work) every few weeks! Get dripped out or don't (L drip bozo) your choice.

review_2: There is an error on the pc that says photon isn’t working or something like that idk if this is just me or not
review_3: The release date for kong is coming out on Sunday 5/21/2023 at 3 PM PST and this message was posted on Trout’s Discord server by trout himself “Release date is 3 pm pst Sunday 5/21/2023. We've been up working non stop since yesterday afternoon trying to make this happen, but we are people and people need sleep. Thank you to everyone who's supported us throughout all these setbacks. I'd rather launch something that we can be proud of and be able to interact with the community when it comes out, then to rush it out and drop dead asleep. I know a lot of people are disappointed and I completely understand, I'm sorry for letting you down today. We'll continue to do everything we can tomorrow. Goodnight gang” Now that trout posted the release date and time has been revealed that means that the servers might fill up and maybe crash the game since they’ve hyped and milked the game too much to the point everyone is excited to get on their vr headsets to play the game.
review_4: When this game was announced he said it like it would be more than this a great game but he didn’t give it the best he could. I mean he has made some great horror gorilla games but didn’t release them and they should have been included in the grand opening of kong. Overall it is an alright game but it is just missing something 🤷
